Subject: Request for MIME media type Application/Vendor Tree - vnd.

E-mail : okudaira&candy.paso.fujitsu.co.jp

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.fujitsu.oasys3

Required parameters : none


Optional parameters : 
none


Encoding considerations : 
nothing, using "binary"



Security considerations : 
nothing, don't have executing mechanisms.



Interoperability considerations : 
This media type will be using by OASYS.



Published specification : 
nothing.



Applications which use this media : 
following applications of FUJITSU.
- OASYS for Windows
- OASYS V5



Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : none
2. File extension(s) : oa3
3. Macintosh file type code : none




Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Seiji Okudaira
2. E-mail : okudaira&candy.paso.fujitsu.co.jp

Intended usage : Common 
This media type will be using HTTP.
